game_description: Tired of being trapped in your house due to the ravages of the plague? Why not fight back and turn your humble abode into a glorious haven! Gather resources by putting in hard work in chopping wood, mining stone etc. Build your new home to live in however you like. Eventually become a stronghold so prosperous that you'll have to defend it from creatures raiding you for riches! Be a hero in VR and you'll be as fit as one in real life! If you're interested in keeping fit and diving into a fantasy world as a hero, check out our upcoming VR game IgKnight Stongholds! If you'd like to know more, join our discord channel and chat with us! Join early and be part of the development! Discord: https://discord.gg/J6atgX6GxS Follow our development: https://trello.com/b/YcOogQLg/igknight-strongholds
